item.title: CodeArtifact
item.description: About AWS CodeArtifact is a fully managed artifact repository service that makes it easy for organizations of any size to securely store, publish, and share software packages used in their software development process. Documentation User Guide CodeAr­tifact is a secure storage, publishing, and sharing of software code packages used in a development process organisation’s software development. CodeAr­tifact makes it easy for small organisations to store, publish, and share software packages. CodeArtifact can be configured to automatically fetch software packages and dependencies from public artifact repositories.
